Chattanooga.WLND:
WLND (98.1 FM, "The Lake") is a radio station serving the Chattanooga, Tennessee area. The station is owned by Entercom and is licensed to serve Signal Mountain, Tennessee, United States.


== History ==
This station first went on the air in 1990 at 97.3 FM with the call letters WKXJ. The station played a Rhythmic Contemporary format and was branded as "97 Kicks".
